section.name: Maven Gettext Plugin
section.p: A plugin to integrate gettext tools into a Maven build.
This plugin is for Maven 1.x. Look here for a Maven 2.x plugin.

section.name: Installation
section.p: There are two alternative ways to install the plugin. Choose one:

ul.li:
The easiest way to install the gettext plugin is through Maven:
maven plugin:download -DartifactId=maven-gettext-plugin -DgroupId=xnap-commons -Dversion=1.0

Alternatively add a dependency to your project.xml:
<dependency> <groupId>xnap-commons</groupId> <artifactId>maven-gettext-plugin</artifactId> <version>1.0</version> <type>plugin</type> </dependency>
